description: This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.

translations.description: يقرأ محتويات الحافظة تلقائيًا عند اكتشاف تغيير.

This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
Mit dieser Erweiterung können Sie in einer Nachricht verschiedene Zeichen-Informationen erhalten.
Allows creation of application-specific dictionaries. Use the command "NVDA+Control+Shift+d" to access the dictionary for the current application.
Este complemento permite presentar en un mensaje información diversa sobre un carácter.

Cette extension permet d'afficher dans un message des informations sur un caractère.
Este complemento permite presentar nunha mensaxe distinta información sobre un carácter.

Browser Navigation addon.
In browsers it allows to quickly find vertically aligned paragraphs with the same offset from the left edge of the screen, such as first level comments in a hierarchical tree of comments.
It can also find paragraphs with the same font size or same font style.
